Thanks for the effort, the quality is great and it's an awesome movie.

However, when people download 720p quality movie files, they shouldn't usually mind the extra 30 MBs and you should have kept the end credits.

Also, I don't believe this is the original version of the movie. The one that I have seen before ended with Macha killing himself, rather than the chess scene and some blokes talking about the real enemy.

I feel that that ending is really important and it really hurts the story when the ending is changed. They got the homicidal maniac to kill himself rather than killing Jake by messing with his head, that's the story. Destroying your evil enemy without committing murder so you'd never have to look over your shoulder again.
Actually i read the the maker of this movie intended for there to be no credits at the end of the movie.
